atk-s0511a3:1_0: Rammanagaravāsinopi te upāsakā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṁ datvā
atk-s0511a3:1_1: puna bhagavantaṁ bhuttāviṁ onītapattapāṇiṁ mālāgandhādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā dānānumodanaṁ
atk-s0511a3:1_2: sotukāmā upanisīdiṁsu. Atha satthā tesaṁ paramamadhuraṁ hadayaṅgamaṁ dānānumodanamakāsi –
atk-s0511a3:13: Ko hi nāma naro loke, na dadeyya hite rato.
atk-s0511a3:15: Na dajjā sukhappadaṁ dānaṁ, dānaṁ cittappamodanaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:19: Kittimanantaṁ yāti ca dātā, vissasanīyo hoti ca dātā.
atk-s0511a3:20: “Datvā dānaṁ yāti naro so, bhogasamiddhiṁ dīghañcāyu;
atk-s0511a3:21: Sussaratampi ca vindati rūpaṁ, sagge saddhiṁ kīḷati devehi;
atk-s0511a3:24: Dadāti taṁ sāvakañāṇabhūmiṁ, paccekabhūmiṁ pana buddhabhūmi”nti. –
atk-s0511a3:25: Evamādinā nayena dānānumodanaṁ katvā dānānisaṁsaṁ pakāsetvā tadanantaraṁ sīlakathaṁ kathesi. Sīlaṁ nāmetaṁ idhalokaparalokasampattīnaṁ mūlaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:26: “Sīlaṁ sukhānaṁ paramaṁ nidānaṁ, sīlena sīlī tidivaṁ payāti;
atk-s0511a3:28: “Avassayo sīlasamo janānaṁ, kuto panañño idha vā parattha;
atk-s0511a3:29: Sīlaṁ guṇānaṁ paramā patiṭṭhā, yathā dharā thāvarajaṅgamānaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:32_0: Sīlālaṅkārasamo alaṅkāro natthi, sīlagandhasamo gandho natthi, sīlasamaṁ kilesamalavisodhanaṁ
atk-s0511a3:32_1: natthi, sīlasamaṁ pariḷāhūpasamaṁ natthi, sīlasamaṁ kittijananaṁ natthi, sīlasamaṁ
atk-s0511a3:32_2: saggārohaṇasopānaṁ natthi, nibbānanagarappavesane ca sīlasamaṁ dvāraṁ natthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a3:36: Yo samaṁ anuvāte ca, paṭivāte ca vāyati. ;
atk-s0511a3:37: “Na pupphagandho paṭivātameti, na candanaṁ taggaramallikā vā;
atk-s0511a3:38: Satañca gandho paṭivātameti, sabbā disā sappuriso pavāyati.
atk-s0511a3:41: “Na gaṅgā yamunā cāpi, sarabhū vā sarasvatī;
atk-s0511a3:44: Visodhayati sattānaṁ, yaṁ ve sīlajalaṁ malaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:45: “Na taṁ sajaladā vātā, na cāpi haricandanaṁ;
atk-s0511a3:46: Neva hārā na maṇayo, na candakiraṇaṅkurā.
atk-s0511a3:48: Yaṁ sameti idaṁ ariyaṁ, sīlaṁ accantasītalaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:52: Dvāraṁ vā pana nibbāna, nagarassa pavesane.
atk-s0511a3:55_0: Evaṁ bhagavā sīlānisaṁsaṁ dassetvā – “idaṁ pana sīlaṁ nissāya ayaṁ saggo labhatī”ti
atk-s0511a3:55_1: dassanatthaṁ tadanantaraṁ saggakathaṁ kathesi. Ayaṁ saggo nāma iṭṭho kanto manāpo
atk-s0511a3:55_2: ekantasukho niccamettha kīḷā niccaṁ sampattiyo labhanti. Cātumahārājikā devā navutivassasatasahassāni
atk-s0511a3:55_3: dibbasukhaṁ dibbasampattiṁ paṭilabhanti. Tāvatiṁsā tisso vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānīti
atk-s0511a3:55_4: evamādisaggaguṇapaṭisaṁyuttakathaṁ kathesi. Evaṁ saggakathāya palobhetvā puna – “ayampi
atk-s0511a3:55_5: saggo anicco adhuvo na tattha chandarāgo kātabbo”ti kāmānaṁ ādīnavaṁ okāraṁ saṁkilesaṁ
atk-s0511a3:55_6: nekkhamme ānisaṁsañca pakāsetvā amatapariyosānaṁ dhammakathaṁ kathesi. Evaṁ tassa
atk-s0511a3:55_7: mahājanassa dhammaṁ desetvā ekacce saraṇesu ca ekacce pañcasīlesu ca ekacce sotāpattiphale
atk-s0511a3:55_8: ca ekacce sakadāgāmiphale ekacce anāgāmiphale ekacce catūsupi phalesu ekacce tīsu
atk-s0511a3:55_9: vijjāsu ekacce chasu abhiññāsu ekacce aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu patiṭṭhāpetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0511a3:55_10: rammanagarato nikkhamitvā sudassanamahāvihārameva pāvisi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a3:61: Kañci pañcasu sīlesu, sīle dasavidhe paraṁ.
atk-s0511a3:64: Kassaci asame dhamme, deti so paṭisambhidā.
atk-s0511a3:77_0: Tattha teti rammanagaravāsino upāsakā. Saraṇanti ettha saraṇaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ saraṇassa
atk-s0511a3:77_1: gantā ca veditabbā. Sarati hiṁsati vināsetīti saraṇaṁ, kiṁ taṁ? Ratanattayaṁ. Taṁ
atk-s0511a3:77_2: pana saraṇagatānaṁ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṁ santāsaṁ dukkhaṁ duggatiṁ parikkilesaṁ
atk-s0511a3:77_3: hanati hiṁsati vināsetīti saraṇanti vuccatīti. Vuttañhetaṁ –
atk-s0511a3:78: “Ye keci buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṁ;
atk-s0511a3:80: “Ye keci dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṁ;
atk-s0511a3:82: “Ye keci saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṁ;
atk-s0511a3:84: Saraṇagamanaṁ nāma ratanattayaparāyanākārappavatto cittuppādo. Saraṇassa gantā nāma taṁsamaṅgīpuggalo. Evaṁ tāva saraṇaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ saraṇassa gantā cāti idaṁ tayaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:85_0: Tassāti taṁ dīpaṅkaraṁ, upayogatthe sāmivacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. “Upagacchuṁ saraṇaṁ tatthā”tipi
atk-s0511a3:85_1: pāṭho. Satthunoti satthāraṁ. Saraṇāgamane kañcīti kañci puggalaṁ saraṇagamane nivesetīti
atk-s0511a3:85_2: attho. Kiñcāpi paccuppannavasena vuttaṁ, atītakālavasena pana attho gahetabbo. Esa
atk-s0511a3:85_3: nayo sesesupi. “Kassaci saraṇāgamane”tipi pāṭho, tassapi soyevattho. Kañci pañcasu
atk-s0511a3:85_4: sīlesūti kañci puggalaṁ pañcasu viratisīlesu nivesesīti attho. “Kassaci pañcasu sīlesū”tipi
atk-s0511a3:85_5: pāṭho, soyevattho. Sīle dasavidhe paranti aparaṁ puggalaṁ dasavidhe sīle nivesesīti
atk-s0511a3:85_6: attho. “Kassaci kusale dasā”tipi pāṭho, tassa kañci puggalaṁ dasa kusaladhamme samādapesīti
atk-s0511a3:85_7: attho. Kassaci deti sāmaññanti ettha paramatthato sāmaññanti maggo vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a3:86: “Katamañca, bhikkhave, sāmaññaṁ? Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṁ – sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāsamādhi. Idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, sāmañña”nti.
atk-s0511a3:87_0: Caturo phalamuttameti cattāri uttamāni phalānīti attho. Ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Liṅgavipariyāsena
atk-s0511a3:87_1: vuttaṁ. Yathopanissayaṁ cattāro magge cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni kassaci adāsīti attho.
atk-s0511a3:87_2: Kassaci asame dhammeti kassaci asadise cattāro paṭisambhidādhamme adāsi.
atk-s0511a3:88_0: Kassaci varasamāpattiyoti kassaci pana nīvaraṇavigamena padhānabhūtā aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-s0511a3:88_1: adāsi. Tisso kassaci vijjāyoti kassaci puggalassa upanissayavasena dibbacakkhuñāṇapubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaāsavakkhayañāṇānaṁ
atk-s0511a3:88_2: vasena tisso vijjāyo. Chaḷabhiññā pavecchatīti cha abhiññāyo kassaci adāsi.
atk-s0511a3:89_0: Tena yogenāti tena nayena tenānukkamena ca. Janakāyanti janasamūhaṁ. Ovadatīti ovadi.
atk-s0511a3:89_1: Kālavipariyāsena vuttanti veditabbaṁ. Ito uparipi īdisesu vacanesu atītakālavaseneva
atk-s0511a3:89_2: attho gahetabbo. Tena vitthārikaṁ āsīti tena dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato ovādena anusāsaniyā
atk-s0511a3:90_0: Mahāhanūti mahāpurisānaṁ kira dvepi hanūni paripuṇṇāni dvādasiyā pakkhassa candasadisākārāni
atk-s0511a3:90_1: hontīti mahantāni hanūni yassa so mahāhanu, sīhahanūti vuttaṁ hoti. Usabhakkhandhoti
atk-s0511a3:90_2: usabhasseva khandho yassa bhavati, so usabhakkhandho. Suvaṭṭitasuvaṇṇāliṅgasadisarucirakkhandho
atk-s0511a3:90_3: samavaṭṭacārukkhandhoti attho. Dīpaṅkarasanāmakoti dīpaṅkarasanāmo. Bahū jane tārayatīti
atk-s0511a3:90_4: bahū buddhaveneyye jane tāresi. Parimocetīti parimocesi. Duggatinti duggatito. Nissakkatthe upayogavacanaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:91_0: Idāni tāraṇaparimocanakaraṇākāradassanatthaṁ “bodhaneyyaṁ jana”nti gāthā vuttā. Tattha
atk-s0511a3:91_1: bodhaneyyaṁ jananti bodhaneyyaṁ pajaṁ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Disvāti buddhacakkhunā vā
atk-s0511a3:91_2: samantacakkhunā vā disvā. Satasahassepi yojaneti anekasatasahassepi yojane ṭhitaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:91_3: Idaṁ pana dasasahassiyaṁyeva sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:92_0: Dīpaṅkaro kira satthā buddhattaṁ patvā bodhimūle sattasattāhaṁ vītināmetvā aṭṭhame
atk-s0511a3:92_1: sattāhe mahābrahmuno dhammajjhesanaṁ paṭiññāya sunandārāme dhammacakkaṁ pavattetvā
atk-s0511a3:92_2: koṭisataṁ devamanussānaṁ dhammāmataṁ pāyesi. Ayaṁ paṭhamo abhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a3:93_0: Atha satthā attano puttassa samavaṭṭakkhandhassa usabhakkhandhassa nāma ñāṇaparipākaṁ
atk-s0511a3:93_1: ñatvā taṁ atrajaṁ pamukhaṁ katvā rāhulovādasadisaṁ dhammaṁ desetvā devamanussānaṁ
atk-s0511a3:93_2: navutikoṭiyo dhammāmataṁ pāyesi. Ayaṁ dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a3:94_0: Puna bhagavā amaravatīnagaradvāre mahāsirīsarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ katvā mahājanassa
atk-s0511a3:94_3: attano jananiṁ sumedhādeviṁ pamukhaṁ katvā sabbalokaviditavisuddhidevo devadevo dīpaṅkaro
atk-s0511a3:94_5: abhidhammapiṭakaṁ desetvā navutidevakoṭisahassānaṁ dhammāmataṁ pāyesi. Ayaṁ tatiyo
atk-s0511a3:101: Dīpaṅkarassa pana bhagavato tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṁ. Tattha sunandārāme koṭisatasahassānaṁ paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a3:105_0: Athāparena samayena dasabalo catūhi bhikkhusatasahassehi parivuto gāmanigamanagarapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0511a3:105_1: mahājanānuggahaṁ karonto cārikaṁ caramāno anukkamena ekasmiṁ padese mahājanakatasakkāraṁ
atk-s0511a3:105_4: pabbataṁ sampāpuṇi. So kira pabbato nāradena nāma yakkhena pariggahito ahosi. Tattha
atk-s0511a3:105_5: pana tassa yakkhassa anusaṁvaccharaṁ mahājano manussabaliṁ upasaṁharati.
atk-s0511a3:106_0: Atha dīpaṅkaro kira bhagavā tassa mahājanassa upanissayasampattiṁ disvā tato bhikkhusaṅghaṁ
atk-s0511a3:106_1: cātuddisaṁ pesetvā adutiyo asahāyo mahākaruṇābalavasaṅgatahadayo tañca yakkhaṁ vinetuṁ
atk-s0511a3:106_2: taṁ nāradapabbataṁ abhiruhi. Atha so manussabhakkho sakahitanirapekkho paravadhadakkho
atk-s0511a3:106_3: yakkho makkhaṁ asahamāno kodhaparetamānaso dasabalaṁ bhiṁsāpetvā palāpetukāmo taṁ
atk-s0511a3:106_4: pabbataṁ cālesi. So kira pabbato tena cāliyamāno bhagavato ānubhāvena tasseva matthake
atk-s0511a3:107_0: Tato so bhīto – “handa naṁ agginā jhāpessāmī”ti mahantaṁ atibhīmadassanaṁ aggikkhandhaṁ
atk-s0511a3:107_1: nibbattesi. So aggikkhandho paṭivāte khitto viya attanova dukkhaṁ janesi, na pana
atk-s0511a3:107_2: bhagavato cīvare aṁsumattampi daḍḍhuṁ samattho ahosi. Yakkho pana “samaṇo daḍḍho,
atk-s0511a3:107_3: na daḍḍho”ti olokento dasabalaṁ saradasamayavimalakaranikaraṁ sabbajanaratikaraṁ
atk-s0511a3:107_4: rajanikaramiva sītalajalatalagatakamalakaṇṇikāya nisinnaṁ viya bhagavantaṁ disvā
atk-s0511a3:107_5: cintesi – “aho ayaṁ samaṇo mahānubhāvo, yaṁ yaṁ imassāhaṁ anatthaṁ karomi, so so
atk-s0511a3:107_6: mamūpariyeva patati, imaṁ pana samaṇaṁ muñcitvā aññaṁ me paṭisaraṇaṁ parāyanaṁ natthi,
atk-s0511a3:107_7: pathaviyaṁ upakkhalitā pathaviṁyeva nissāya uṭṭhahanti, handāhaṁ imaṁyeva samaṇaṁ
atk-s0511a3:108_0: Athevaṁ pana so cintetvā bhagavato cakkālaṅkatatalesu pādesu sirasā nipatitvā – “accayo
atk-s0511a3:108_1: maṁ, bhante, accagamā”ti vatvā bhagavantaṁ saraṇamagamāsi. Athassa bhagavā anupubbikathaṁ
atk-s0511a3:108_2: kathesi. So desanāpariyosāne dasahi yakkhasahassehi saddhiṁ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0511a3:108_3: Tasmiṁ kira divase sakalajambudīpatalavāsino manussā tassa balikammatthaṁ ekekagāmato
atk-s0511a3:108_4: ekekaṁ purisaṁ āhariṁsu. Aññañca bahutilataṇḍulakulatthamuggamāsādiṁ sappinavanītatelamadhuphāṇitādiñca
atk-s0511a3:108_5: āhariṁsu. Atha so yakkho taṁ divasaṁ ābhatataṇḍulādikaṁ sabbaṁ tesaṁyeva datvā te
atk-s0511a3:109_0: Atha satthā te manusse ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā antosattāheyeva sabbe arahatte
atk-s0511a3:109_2: pātimokkhamuddisi. Caturaṅgāni nāma sabbeva ehibhikkhū honti, sabbe chaḷabhiññā honti,
atk-s0511a3:109_3: sabbe anāmantitāva āgatā, pannarasūposathadivaso cāti imāni cattāri aṅgāni nāma.
atk-s0511a3:109_4: Ayaṁ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a3:113: Tattha pavivekagateti gaṇaṁ pahāya gate. Samiṁsūti sannipatiṁsu.
atk-s0511a3:114_0: Yadā pana dīpaṅkaro lokanāyako sudassananāmake pabbate vassāvāsamupagañchi, tadā
atk-s0511a3:114_1: kira jambudīpavāsino manussā anusaṁvaccharaṁ giraggasamajjaṁ karonti. Tasmiṁ kira
atk-s0511a3:114_2: samajje sannipatitā manussā dasabalaṁ disvā dhammakathaṁ sutvā tatra pasīditvā pabbajiṁsu.
atk-s0511a3:114_3: Mahāpavāraṇadivase satthā tesaṁ ajjhāsayānukūlaṁ vipassanākathaṁ kathesi. Taṁ sutvā
atk-s0511a3:114_4: te sabbe saṅkhāre sammasitvā vipassanānupubbena maggānupubbena ca arahattaṁ pāpuṇiṁsu.
atk-s0511a3:114_5: Atha satthā navutikoṭisahassehi saddhiṁ pavāresi. Ayaṁ tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a3:120_0: Ayaṁ gāthā aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāya nidānavaṇṇanāya dīpaṅkarabuddhavaṁse
atk-s0511a3:120_1: likhitā. Imasmiṁ pana buddhavaṁse natthi. Natthibhāvoyeva panassā yuttataro. Kasmāti
atk-s0511a3:121_0: Dīpaṅkare kira bhagavati dhammaṁ desente dasasahassānañca vīsatisahassānañca dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0511a3:121_1: ahosiyeva. Ekassa pana dvinnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ catunnanti ca ādivasena abhisamayānaṁ anto
atk-s0511a3:121_2: natthi. Tasmā dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato sāsanaṁ vitthārikaṁ bāhujaññaṁ ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a3:125_1: catusaccadhammappaṭivedho. Ekadvinnanti ekassa ceva dvinnañca, tiṇṇaṁ catunnaṁ…pe…
atk-s0511a3:125_2: dasannantiādinā nayena asaṅkhyeyyāti attho. Evaṁ asaṅkhyeyyābhisamayattā ca vitthārikaṁ
atk-s0511a3:125_3: mahantappattaṁ bahūhi paṇḍitehi devamanussehi niyyānikanti jaññaṁ jānitabbaṁ adhisīlasikkhādīhi
atk-s0511a3:125_4: iddhañca samādhiādīhi phītañca ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a3:129_0: Tattha suvisodhitanti suṭṭhu bhagavatā sodhitaṁ visuddhaṁ kataṁ. Dīpaṅkaraṁ kira
atk-s0511a3:129_1: satthāraṁ sabbakālaṁ chaḷabhiññānaṁ mahiddhikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ cattāri satasahassāni
atk-s0511a3:129_2: parivārenti. Tena ca samayena ye sekkhā kālakiriyaṁ karonti, te garahitā bhavanti,
atk-s0511a3:129_3: sabbe khīṇāsavā hutvāva parinibbāyantīti adhippāyo. Tasmā hi tassa bhagavato sāsanaṁ
atk-s0511a3:129_4: supupphitaṁ susamiddhaṁ khīṇāsavehi bhikkhūhi ativiya sobhittha. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a3:134: “Ye keci tena samayena, jahanti mānusaṁ bhavaṁ;
atk-s0511a3:139_0: Tattha cattāri satasahassānīti gaṇanāya dassitā evaṁ dassitagaṇanā ime bhikkhūti
atk-s0511a3:139_1: dassanatthaṁ “chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikā”ti vuttanti evamattho gahetabbo. Atha vā chaḷabhiññā
atk-s0511a3:139_2: mahiddhikāti chaḷabhiññānaṁ mahiddhikānanti sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:139_3: Parivārenti sabbadāti niccakālaṁ dasabalaṁ parivārenti, bhagavantaṁ muñcitvā katthaci
atk-s0511a3:139_4: na gacchantīti adhippāyo. Tena samayenāti tasmiṁ samaye. Ayaṁ pana samaya-saddo samavāyādīsu
atk-s0511a3:141: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissatī”ti. ;
atk-s0511a3:142_0: Idha so kāle daṭṭhabbo; tasmiṁ kāleti attho. Mānusaṁ bhavanti manussabhāvaṁ. Appattamānasāti
atk-s0511a3:142_1: appattaṁ anadhigataṁ mānasaṁ yehi te appattamānasā. Mānasanti rāgassa ca cittassa
atk-s0511a3:142_2: ca arahattassa ca adhivacanaṁ. “Antalikkhacaro pāso, yvāyaṁ carati mānaso”ti hi ettha
atk-s0511a3:142_3: pana rāgo “mānaso”ti vutto. “Cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍara”nti ettha cittaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:142_4: “Appattamānaso sekho, kālaṁ kayirā janesutā”ti ettha arahattaṁ. Idhāpi arahattameva
atk-s0511a3:142_5: adhippetaṁ. Tasmā appattaarahattaphalāti attho. Sekhāti kenaṭṭhena sekhā? Sekhadhammapaṭilābhaṭṭhena
atk-s0511a3:142_6: sekhā. Vuttañhetaṁ – “kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sekho hotīti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu
atk-s0511a3:142_7: sekhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato hoti…pe… sekhena sammāsamādhinā samannāgato hoti.
atk-s0511a3:142_8: Ettāvatā kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekho hotī”ti. Api ca sikkhantīti sekhā. Vuttañhetaṁ
atk-s0511a3:142_9: – “sikkhati, sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā sekhoti vuccati. Kiñca sikkhati? Adhisīlampi
atk-s0511a3:142_10: sikkhati adhicittampi adhipaññampi sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā sekhoti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0511a3:143_0: Supupphitanti suṭṭhu vikasitaṁ. Pāvacananti pasatthaṁ vacanaṁ, vuddhippattaṁ vā vacanaṁ
atk-s0511a3:143_1: pavacanaṁ, pavacanameva pāvacanaṁ, sāsananti attho. Upasobhatīti abhirājati ativirocati.
atk-s0511a3:144_0: Tassa dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato rammavatī nāma nagaraṁ ahosi, sudevo nāma khattiyo pitā,
atk-s0511a3:144_1: sumedhā nāma devī mātā, sumaṅgalo ca tisso cāti dve aggasāvakā, sāgato nāma upaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0511a3:144_2: nandā ca sunandā cāti dve aggasāvikā, bodhi tassa bhagavato pipphalirukkho ahosi,
atk-s0511a3:144_3: asītihatthubbedho, satasahassavassāni āyūti. Kiṁ panimesaṁ jātanagarādīnaṁ dassane
atk-s0511a3:144_4: payojananti ce? Vuccate – yassa yadi neva jātanagaraṁ na pitā na mātā paññāyeyya,
atk-s0511a3:144_5: imassa pana neva jātanagaraṁ na pitā na mātā paññāyati, devo vā sakko vā yakkho vā
atk-s0511a3:144_6: māro vā brahmā vā esa maññe, devānampi īdisaṁ pāṭihāriyaṁ anacchariyanti maññamānā
atk-s0511a3:144_7: na sotabbaṁ na saddahitabbaṁ maññeyyuṁ, tato abhisamayo na bhaveyya, asati abhisamaye
atk-s0511a3:144_8: niratthako buddhuppādo bhaveyya, aniyyānikaṁ sāsanaṁ. Tasmā sabbabuddhānaṁ jātanagarādiko
atk-s0511a3:159: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṁ bahuṁ.
atk-s0511a3:164: “Sā ca iddhi so ca yaso, tāni ca pādesu cakkaratanāni;
atk-s0511a3:166_0: Tattha sudevo nāma khattiyoti sudevo nāmassa khattiyo pitā ahosīti attho. Janikāti
atk-s0511a3:166_1: janetti. Pipphalīti pilakkhakapītanarukkho bodhi. Asītihatthamubbedhoti asītihatthaṁ
atk-s0511a3:166_2: uccaggato. Dīparukkho vāti sampajjalitadīpamālākulo dīparukkho viya ārohapariṇāhasaṇṭhānapāripūrisampanno
atk-s0511a3:166_4: gaganatalaṁ bhagavā dharamānakāle sobhatīti sobhittha. Sālarājāva phullitoti pupphito
atk-s0511a3:166_5: sabbaphāliphullo sālarājarukkho viya ca sabbaphāliphullo yojanasatubbedho pāricchatto
atk-s0511a3:166_6: viya ca asītihatthubbedho bhagavā ativiya sobhati.
atk-s0511a3:167_0: Satasahassavassānīti vassasatasahassāni tassa āyūti attho. Tāvatā tiṭṭhamānoti tāvatakaṁ
atk-s0511a3:167_1: kālaṁ tiṭṭhamāno. Janatanti janasamūhaṁ. Santāretvā mahājananti tārayitvā mahājanaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:167_2: “Santāretvā sadevaka”ntipi pāṭho, tassa sadevakaṁ lokanti attho. Sā ca iddhīti sā
atk-s0511a3:167_3: ca sampatti ānubhāvo. So ca yasoti so ca parivāro. Sabbaṁ tamantarahitanti taṁ sabbaṁ
atk-s0511a3:167_4: vuttappakāraṁ sampattijātaṁ antarahitaṁ apagatanti attho. Nanu rittā sabbasaṅkhārāti
atk-s0511a3:167_5: sabbe pana saṅkhatadhammā nanu rittā tucchā, niccasārādirahitāti attho.
atk-s0511a3:168_0: Ettha pana nagarādiparicchedo pāḷiyamāgatova. Sambahulavāro pana nāgato, so ānetvā
atk-s0511a3:168_1: dīpetabbo. Seyyathidaṁ – puttaparicchedo, bhariyāparicchedo, pāsādaparicchedo, agāravāsaparicchedo,
atk-s0511a3:168_3: upaṭṭhākaparicchedoti. Etesampi dīpane kāraṇaṁ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Tassa pana dīpaṅkarassa
atk-s0511a3:168_4: bhariyānaṁ tisatasahassaṁ ahosi. Tassa aggamahesī padumā nāma, tassa pana putto usabhakkhandho nāma. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a3:175_0: Sabbabuddhānaṁ pana pañca vemattāni honti āyuvemattaṁ pamāṇavemattaṁ kulavemattaṁ
atk-s0511a3:175_1: padhānavemattaṁ rasmivemattanti. Tattha āyuvemattaṁ nāma keci dīghāyukā honti keci
atk-s0511a3:175_2: appāyukā. Tathā hi dīpaṅkarassa pana bhagavato vassasatasahassaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ ahosi,
atk-s0511a3:176: Pamāṇavemattaṁ nāma keci dīghā honti keci rassā. Tathā hi dīpaṅkaro asītihatthappamāṇo ahosi, amhākaṁ pana bhagavā aṭṭhārasahatthappamāṇo.
atk-s0511a3:177: Kulavemattaṁ nāma keci khattiyakule nibbattanti keci brāhmaṇakule. Tathā hi dīpaṅkarādayo khattiyakule nibbattiṁsu, kakusandhakoṇāgamanādayo brāhmaṇakule.
atk-s0511a3:178: Padhānavemattaṁ nāma kesañci padhānaṁ ittarameva hoti yathā kassapassa bhagavato, kesañci addhaniyaṁ amhākaṁ bhagavato viya.
atk-s0511a3:179_0: Rasmivemattaṁ nāma maṅgalassa bhagavato sarīrasmi dasasahassilokadhātuṁ pharitvā
atk-s0511a3:179_1: aṭṭhāsi, amhākaṁ bhagavato byāmamattaṁ. Tatra rasmivemattaṁ ajjhāsayapaṭibaddhaṁ
atk-s0511a3:179_2: hoti. Yo yattakaṁ icchasi, tassa tattakaṁ sarīrappabhā pharati. Maṅgalassa pana “dasasahassilokadhātuṁ
atk-s0511a3:179_3: pharatū”ti ajjhāsayo ahosi. Paṭividdhaguṇesu pana kassaci vemattaṁ nāma natthi.
atk-s0511a3:180_0: Tathā sabbabuddhānaṁ cattāri avijahitaṭṭhānāni nāma honti. Bodhipallaṅko avijahito
atk-s0511a3:180_1: ekasmiṁyeva ṭhāne hoti. Dhammacakkappavattanaṭṭhānaṁ isipatane migadāye avijahitameva
atk-s0511a3:180_2: hoti. Devorohaṇakāle saṅkassanagaradvāre paṭhamapādakkamo avijahitova hoti. Jetavane
atk-s0511a3:180_3: gandhakuṭiyā cattāri mañcapādaṭṭhānāni avijahitāneva honti. Vihāropi avijahitova.
atk-s0511a3:180_4: So pana khuddako vā mahanto vā hoti.
atk-s0511a3:181_0: Aparaṁ pana amhākaṁyeva bhagavato sahajātaparicchedañca nakkhattaparicchedañca visesaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:181_1: Amhākaṁ sabbaññubodhisattena kira saddhiṁ rāhulamātā ānandatthero channo kaṇḍako
atk-s0511a3:181_2: assarājā nidhikumbhā mahābodhirukkho kāḷudāyīti imāni sata sahajātāni. Mahāpuriso
atk-s0511a3:181_3: kira uttarāsāḷhanakkhatteneva mātukucchiṁ okkami, mahābhinikkhamanaṁ nikkhami, dhammacakkaṁ
atk-s0511a3:181_4: pavattesi, yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ akāsi. Visākhanakkhattena jāto ca abhisambuddho ca parinibbuto
atk-s0511a3:181_5: ca, māghanakkhattena tassa sāvakasannipāto ceva āyusaṅkhāravosajjanañca ahosi, assayujanakkhattena
atk-s0511a3:181_6: devorohaṇanti ettakaṁ āharitvā dīpetabbaṁ. Ayaṁ sambahulavāraparicchedo. Sesagāthā sauttānā evāti.
atk-s0511a3:182: Iti bhagavā dīpaṅkaro yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā sabbabuddhakiccaṁ katvā anukkamena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0511a3:183_0: Yasmiṁ kira kappe dīpaṅkaradasabalo udapādi, tasmiṁ aññepi taṇhaṅkaro, medhaṅkaro,
atk-s0511a3:183_1: saraṇaṅkaroti tayo buddhā ahesuṁ. Tesaṁ santike bodhisattassa byākaraṇaṁ natthi.
atk-s0511a3:183_2: Tasmā te idha na dassitā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana tamhā kappā ādito paṭṭhāyuppannuppanne
atk-s0511a3:186: “Maṅgalo ca sumano ca, revato sobhito muni;
atk-s0511a3:190: “Tisso phusso ca sambuddho, vipassī sikhi vessabhū;
